features: Cucumber & Mint - It's a garden party and the only scents invited are crisp, clean, and refreshing.
Effective Protection - We tested thousands of ingredients before finding a recipe that feels light and fresh under your arms, but provides you with effective protection against odor.
Goes on Easy - Native Deodorant is a solid deodorant that you can apply easily. We also use both safe, synthetic, sustainable fragrances (free of phthalates) and natural fragrances.
Cruelty Free - Native Deodorant never tests on animals, except humans who volunteer to try Native Deodorant.
For Men and Women - Native's high performance award winning formula is strong enough for both men and women. All you have to choose is your favorite scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Native Plastic-Free Deodorant: A Breath of Freshness Without Compromise
reviews.reviewText: Native's Plastic-Free Deodorant stands out as a refreshing and eco-conscious choice for both men and women seeking a natural alternative. Free from aluminum and enriched with ingredients like baking soda, probiotics, coconut oil, and shea butter, this deodorant offers reliable protection with a touch of luxury.The Cucumber & Mint scent is invigorating, providing a burst of freshness throughout the day. The commitment to a plastic-free design aligns with eco-friendly values, making it an excellent choice for those looking to reduce their environmental footprint.The application is smooth, and the deodorant keeps you feeling confident without compromising on skin-friendly ingredients. The blend of probiotics and natural oils ensures a gentle and effective solution for all-day freshness.In summary, Native Plastic-Free Deodorant is a standout option for individuals seeking a natural, aluminum-free deodorant with a commitment to sustainability. The Cucumber & Mint variant is a delightful, gender-neutral choice that delivers on both performance and eco-conscious values. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Native products!
reviews.reviewText: The plastic free can be a bit confusing because the shipping via Amazon at times isn’t the best. When it arrived it was shipped with a case of Almond milk which was heavy. I mean I couldn’t have places in the box with my idk, pillowcases I ordered I suppose right. {insert sarcasm here} or even the small jar of Mayo. But by golly ship it with a case of almond milk so it squishes the be-jesus out of it. So the bottom cardboard piece fell off the deodorant. At first I didn’t know if it was the bottom or top. It was my first time ordering the plastic free one. But it was the only logical fit. But I couldn’t get it to go back on. But thank the good Lord someone posted a 16 sec video on how it works and I watched it a couple times and seen how you push from the bottom. Which I had been trying to do and nada! But ohhh, that outer pice you’re look at is a cover that slides off the top. So I looked under it and seen two pieces of cardboard and grabbed my tweezers and pulled on the innermost tube while holding the outer covering and it slide right out. THEN I was able to slide the bottom piece back on that was knocked off during the delivery via Amazon. So now I know how it works. So I’m good now. Fwiw, Walmart also sells Native brand items. I did pick up this scent a couple days ago while there because now my youngest daughter wants to use it as well. But this must be a popular scent but it was the last one in that slot. While all the others were still fairly full. I tell ya what. The body wash in this scent is also really good too. Kinda reminds me Old Spice with a tiny splash of Stetson. It’s mild enough not to give a headache since I am sensitive to scents but just strong enough to give a hint of a lingering scent that smells good. And it’s bigger bottles than Bath and Body Works and toxic free as well. You really can’t beat that!!! As an avid BBW user for many many years. I love this! I’ve recently started changing all of our products to toxic free and finding products that smell good but work can be difficult. So glad I found Native.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is amazing, new packaging is a fail
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Native Deodorant for years. The formulas and scents are great, and they're effective and aluminum free. The Lavender Rose scent is attractive without being overly sweet and mixes well with other perfumes one might wear.I bought my last Native deodorant in the new cardboard container, and I have to say, it didn't work well. I applaud the effort to avoid plastic and to create biodegradable/recyclable packaging, but the actual container didn't hold up. Within a week, the container was deteriorating both on the bottom of the lid and on the interior where it connects with the product. It seems the moisture of the product breaks down the cardboard making it wiggle and bend, and then it makes it harder to get in and out of the lid. It was ultra annoying, so I'm not sure I would buy that applicator again until they work out the kinks. What is inside is a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, good performance
reviews.reviewText: I have now tried three different eco-friendly deodorants. This is my favorite. It goes on smoothly and doesn't crumble. I love biodegradable packaging. This moves almost too smoothly through the tube so I have to grip it tightly to keep it from sliding back into the tube during use. I like the cucumber - mint scent, it's fresh but not overpowering. I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product itself but packing is not efficient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love Native, they are cruelty free and their ingredients are clean. I also love the scents! Although some scents don’t work as well as other ones but that’s just for me. My biggest complaint is the packaging. I LOVE that it’s plastic free and this is without a doubt a better alternative!! But it’s not efficient. When I open and close it, it gets stuck. I store it without the lid because it’s easier that way. Also, when you are almost done with the deodorant the whole deodorant piece falls out and you have to apply it holding it. Not a big deal but also not efficient compared to other products.

So before I bought this product I read a lot of reviews about how everyone loves this but have trouble opening it. I still decided to try it. It got delivered today. .. I see EXACTLY what they are talking about.But there's a simple solution. .. just cut two tiny wedges in the lid like I did in the pic. One in each side. And it will open smoothly.I mean ideally the company should just make that change in their packaging. That will be easier.
The cardboard packaging material applicator is a flop though the product ingredient inside is good. Will not buy this packaging anymore.

This stick I have isnt working, as the tube will not move at all to get at the deodorant. Used a few times before it got stuck, excellent deodorant! Just the packaging isnt working for me. I do appreciate the 100% plastic free. I just wish is was working better.
